We often make plots in data science.

here 's the tidyverse
##因为这是一个给别人看的website，去掉不必要的信息

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```


here's a dataframe

```{r}
plot_df =
  tibble(
    x = rnorm(100, mean = 1, sd = 2),
    y = 1 + 2 * x + rnorm(100)
  )
```


here's a plot. This seems to show


```{r}
plot_df |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point()
```
